item.title: 前缀和问题总结
item.description: There are two types of problems solvable by partial sum. 1.Problems which you are asked to answer some queries about the sum of a part of elements (without modify queries). Solution of all of this problems are the same. You just need to know how to solve one of them. Example : You are asked some queries on an array _a_1, _a_2, ..._a_, _n_. Each query give you numbers _l_
